comment.body:
> [ut](#comment_1_1CKNCsrxLY2FUyBVPCykZhZgBcF9GP4vmo): I don't see the point to this list... and this site to tell the truth.. so if I don't want this stuff then I just delete the site from my site list and poof right? or does zeronet keep files on my computer without my knowledge?

So, if some troll posts a nasty picture on a decent site, do you delete the whole site, just because of this one picture?

It may sound harsh, but if pedos would start to post their links here, it would basically be a win-win situation: sickos have a place to share their crap, and decent people can inform themselves about the files and sites they have to stay way from.
